answerText: Interpreter of Maladies[10] Interpreter of Maladies is a short story collection by Jhumpa Lahiri that focuses on the immigrant experiences of people from this country.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Louisville Round 11 | 21 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One story in this collection concerns a storytelling stair-sweeper who becomes ostracized from her community, while another tells of a woman who attempts to drive for the first time to the fish market but gets into a car accident. For 10 points each: [10] Name this short story collection, whose title character is a tour guide who saves a character named Bobby from wild monkeys.
